```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
logs <- read_csv("data/logs.csv", 
    col_types = cols(row_id = col_integer(), 
        player_id = col_integer(), school = col_integer(), 
        date = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d"),
        event_id = col_integer(), event_time_dbl = col_integer(), 
        stack_id = col_integer(), pan_scene_start_left = col_integer(), 
        pan_scene_end_left = col_integer(), 
        sense_id = col_integer(), avatar_age = col_integer()))

S5_scores_cleaned <- read_csv("data/S5_scores_cleaned.csv")
```
